title: Welcome
bullets: This is lesson one of CSS Training Wheels.
If you are looking for a good place for a beginner to start, you are in the right place.

title: This series is for beginners
bullets: This series was created with designers in mind who want to start the transition into front-end-development.
You do not need to be a designer to benefit from this series
Even if you are not a beginner there is always more to learn.

title: This is prep for more involved courses
bullets: Bootcamps go much better if you have an understanding of css.
Most front-end-develoment video courses expect you to know some css.
Understanding some css and how css works will make learning to code a lot easier.

title: It will be helpful to understand a little HTML
bullets: It is not necessary to be an expert in HTML.
All you need is a basic understanding of how HTML tags are structured
